meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Sarah Echt Jay German Tom Smolich Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1160.

td.p: Sarah Echt, a price analyst originally from Akron, Ohio
Jay German, an innkeeper from Los Angeles, California
Tom Smolich, a Catholic priest originally from Sacramento, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $15,400)

tr.td: SINGERS
SPORTS
THE INSECT WORLD
THE WEST INDIES
POTPOURRI
"WET"
